content:
Here is the complete Artificial Intelligence (AI) study plan offered at the University of Prince Mugrin for the academic year 2024–2025. The total credit hours are 132. The study plan includes all years and all courses:

**First Year**

- First Semester:
  - MATH 101 – Calculus I (4 credit hours)
  - GIAS 101 – Islamic Culture (3 credit hours)
  - CS 111 – Introduction to Computing and Programming (4 credit hours)
  - ENGL 101 – First Year Composition (3 credit hours)
  - PHYS 111 – Introduction to Physics (3 credit hours)

- Second Semester:
  - MATH 102 – Calculus II (4 credit hours)
  - GIAS 102 – Arabic Language Skills (3 credit hours)
  - CS 112 – Object Oriented Programming (4 credit hours)
  - ENGL 102 – Introduction to Report Writing (3 credit hours)
  - SE 262 – Software Engineering (3 credit hours) (Co-requisite: CS 112)

**Second Year**

- First Semester:
  - MATH 201 – Differential Equations (3 credit hours)
  - CS 221 – Operating Systems (4 credit hours)
  - CS 201 – Introduction to Discrete Systems (3 credit hours)
  - CS 211 – Data Structures and Algorithms (4 credit hours)
  - AI 381 – Artificial Intelligence I (3 credit hours) (Co-requisite: CS 211)

- Second Semester:
  - STAT 232 – Probability and Statistics (3 credit hours)
  - MATH 204 – Linear Algebra (3 credit hours)
  - ENGL 201 – Technical Writing (3 credit hours)
  - CS 232 – Computer Networks (4 credit hours)
  - AI 372 – Ethics and Professionalism (2 credit hours)
  - AI 382 – Artificial Intelligence II (3 credit hours)

**Third Year**

- First Semester:
  - MATH 303 – Numerical Methods (3 credit hours)
  - AI 418 – Human–Computer Interaction (3 credit hours)
  - AI 305 – Introduction to Machine Learning (4 credit hours)
  - AI 361 – Image Processing (4 credit hours)
  - CS 351 – Fundamentals of Database Systems (4 credit hours)

- Second Semester:
  - AI 385 – Introduction to Computer Vision (4 credit hours)
  - AI 407 – Introduction to Robotics (4 credit hours)
  - AI 417 – Introduction to Deep Learning (4 credit hours)
  - AI 312 – Natural Language Processing (3 credit hours)
  - AI 306 – Data Mining (3 credit hours)

**Fourth Year**

- First Semester:
  - AI 491 – Capstone Project I (3 credit hours)
  - FC 313 – Cyber Security (3 credit hours)
  - AI 438 – Selected Topics in Data Science (2 credit hours)
  - GSOS xxx – Social Sciences Elective (3 credit hours)
  - GHAL xxx – Humanities, Arts, and Languages Elective (3 credit hours)

- Second Semester:
  - AI 492 – Capstone Project II (3 credit hours)

**Additional Options:**

Option A: Cooperative Training Track  
- AI 493 – Cooperative Training (9 credit hours) (Replaces three electives, requires college approval)

Option B: Electives Track  
- Professional Elective I (3 credit hours)  
- College Elective III (3 credit hours)  
- Professional Elective II (3 credit hours)

**Summer Practical Training:**  
- AI 394 – Summer Practical Training (1 credit hour) (Prerequisite: Year 3 core courses)

This detailed plan covers all years, semesters, and required courses to complete the AI program at the University of Prince Mugrin【4:0†Artificial Intelligence Study Plan english.docx】【4:1†Artificial Intelligence Study Plan arabic.docx】【4:2†Artificial Intelligence Study Plan arabic.docx】【4:3†Artificial Intelligence Study Plan arabic.docx】【4:4†Artificial Intelligence Study Plan english.docx】.
